name: Brick Breaker Cash: Win Money
description:
Brick Breaker - win cash is a competitive game where where you can enter tournaments for real money against other players.

HOW TO PLAY:

Brick Breaker is easy to learn but hard to master.
Strategically aim, release and shoot the balls in order to eliminate the as many bricks as you can.
Each turn you get one additional ball and the number of bricks increases exponentially.
The game ends once the bricks reach the bottom.
Stay alive as long as you can!

TOURNAMENTS:

Enter cash tournaments against other players.
Withdraw directly to your debit card, after identity verification withdraws are usually processed in under one minute (test us!).
1 v 1 mode: play head to head against an opponent.
Group mode: Play in larger groups, with larger prizes for who comes out on top.
Blitz mode: See how much you’ve won in real time and try to beat the player average.
The bricks always spawn the same way for both players for a fair match, and you’ll be matched with someone near your skill level so everyone has a chance to win.

CASH TOURNAMENTS:

Cash tournaments are not available in the following US States: AZ, AR, CT, DE, FL, KY, LA, ME, MS, MT, SC, TN.

We’re working to expand our availability.

SUPPORT:

Access live chat support directly in the app at anytime! Make sure you have enough battery to get through a game, and that you will be able to finish once started.

HAVE FUN!

May the force be with you ;)
